titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Train Day.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E817)
Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 5/5/2011--Introduced. Recognizes the important contributions that trains and Amtrak make to the national transportation system. Supports the goals and ideals of National Train Day.
